sentence.Network_en: Using a credit card to pay for an order is simplicity itself.
sentence.Network_cn: 用信用卡支付订单再简单不过了。

means.word_mean: 诚恳,诚实,坦率,质朴,天真,粗心大意

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French simplicite or Latin simplicitas, from simplex (see simplex)

entry.def: The simplicity of something is the fact that it is not complicated and can be understood or done easily.

example.ex: The apparent simplicity of his plot is deceptive...
example.tran: 他的故事情节貌似简单，其实不然。

example.ex: Because of its simplicity, this test could be carried out easily by a family doctor.
example.tran: 这种检查非常简单，家庭医生就可以轻松完成。

entry.def: When you talk about something's simplicity, you approve of it because it has no unnecessary parts or complicated details.

example.ex: ...fussy details that ruin the simplicity of the design...
example.tran: 破坏了这款设计简洁风格的过多的细节

example.ex: A pair of jewelled earrings will liven up this dress without detracting from its simplicity.
example.tran: 一对宝石耳环会让这件礼服更出彩而又不失简洁。

entry.def: If you say that something is simplicity itself, you are emphasizing that it is very simple or easy.

example.ex: The kitchen is simplicity itself, relying on a combination of good design, craftsmanship and quality materials for its effect...
example.tran: 厨房非常简洁，这有赖于好的设计、工艺及可体现这种效果的上乘材料。

example.ex: Using a credit card to pay for an order is simplicity itself.
example.tran: 用信用卡支付订单再简单不过了。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being simple or uncompounded;
2. a lack of penetration or subtlety;
4. freedom from difficulty or hardship or effort;

sentences.sentence: "he rose through the ranks with apparent ease"
"they put it into containers for ease of transportation"
"the room was simply decorated with great restraint"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,表示"某种性质,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absurd荒谬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.荒谬

stems_affixes.value_cn: 权威,威信,权威人士,权力
stems_affixes.word_buile: author创造者+ity某种性质,状态等→n.权威,威信,权威人士,权力
electric电的+ity某种性质,状态等→电,电流

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性
stems_affixes.word_buile: equal相等的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.同等;平等;相等;等式;等同性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
stems_affixes.word_buile: familiar熟悉的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.熟悉,通晓,亲密,熟悉,精通
frugal节约的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.节约,节俭
genial亲切的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.和蔼,温和
infirm弱的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚弱
mendac说谎+ity某种性质,状态等→n.虚假
opportune凑巧的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.机会,时机
prob测试,证明+ity某种性质,状态等→[人]经得起证明和试验
rigid刚硬的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.固执,坚定,僵化
san健康的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.神志清楚
simpl=simple简单的+ic+ity某种性质,状态等→n.简单,简易,朴素,直率
venal贪财的+ity某种性质,状态等→n.唯利是图

Sentence.sentence: Over the years this system has come in for its share of criticism for its simplicity.

sentences.en: He believes everything with childlike simplicity.
sentences.cn: 他像孩子一样单纯, 对一切都信以为真。
